items.sentence: Can anyone guess how many pennies are in this jar?
Can you come this afternoon or tomorrow afternoon?
Can you introduce me to the girl talking with Tom?
Tom doesn\'t see any reason why he can\'t go, too.
Tom annoyed everyone with his constant complaints.
Tom asked Mary how many languages she could speak.
Tom couldn\'t do it, so he asked Mary to help him.
Tom filled his glass and then filled one for Mary.
Tom flopped onto his bed and was soon fast asleep.
Tom folded the newspaper and put it under his arm.
Tom wants information on how his stocks are doing.
I told Tom that I was way too busy to talk to him.
I tried really hard to get Tom to quit doing that.
We\'ve decided to have a private wedding ceremony.
I think that Mary is more beautiful than Alice is.
I assume you know what we\'re supposed to do next.
Tom took a lot of pictures when he was a teenager.
Both Tom and Mary don\'t know how to speak French.
Both Tom and Mary don\'t understand French at all.
I\'d love to do that, but I\'m too busy right now.
